long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
WhatsApp Quick Message is the easiest tool for sending WhatsApp messages without the hassle of saving contacts. Whether you're sending a quick hello, sharing a link, or just need to get in touch with someone, this extension makes it super easy.

Features:

No Contacts Needed: Send WhatsApp messages without adding new contacts to your phone.
International Support: Works with any international number. Just type the full phone number (country code included).
Optional Message: You can add a personalized message or just send a simple text.
Fast & Lightweight: Small extension size, loads quickly, and does exactly what you need.
How to Use:

Enter the Phone Number: Type the full phone number, including the country code. No need to add the + sign‚Äîjust the digits.
Add a Message (Optional): You can choose to add a message or just leave it blank.
Hit Send: Click "Send WhatsApp" and the conversation opens directly in WhatsApp.
Tired of cluttering your contacts list with numbers you might never use again? üòÖ With WhatsApp Quick Message, you stay organized and efficient. No more unnecessary contacts in your phonebook‚Äîjust quick and direct messaging!

Privacy & Security:
We do not collect or store any personal data. Your privacy is our priority.

Support & Feedback:
Have questions or suggestions? Feel free to reach out to me at abreulindealberto@gmail.com.
